title: Who was St Ambrose of Milan?

media:group.media:title: Who was St Ambrose of Milan?
media:group.media:description:
Who was St Ambrose of Milan? This video tells the story. On 7 December 374, Ambrose was ordained bishop of Milan. This short video tells the story of St. Ambrose, how he converted Augustine to the faith, and excommunicated Emperor Theodosius I. 

Suggested works by Ambrose:

'Theological Works (collected)': http://amzn.to/2h2DO6h 
'On the Holy Spirit': http://amzn.to/2h5NM7d  

Ryan M. Reeves (PhD Cambridge) is Assistant Professor of Historical Theology at Gordon-Conwell Theological Seminary.  Twitter: https://twitter.com/RyanMReeves       Instagram: https://instagram.com/ryreeves4/

Ryan's Blog: https://blogs.thegospelcoalition.org/ryanreeves/
